item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So OP either view-sourced and edited, or he made the html himself for the post. Either way:

[quote=“Lothy, post:3, topic:547391”]ITT: OP is 5 years old and still finds random combinations of not-that-offensive words funny.

Please kill yourself, or at least get a vasectomy. This will ensure that your seed doesn’t accidentally spread.[/quote]
